name: ChordWizard Song
summary: Learn about .CWS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The CWS file allows you to protect your songs, disable copying and printing functions, block editing or saving capabilities, embed a link to your member profile on the ChordWizard network, and lock song credits. CWS files can also be uploaded to the ChordWizard network and shared with other members.
To create a CWS file, select File â†’ Save Song or Save Song As....
NOTE: Songtrix is available in bronze, silver, and gold editions, which are geared towards beginner, intermediate, and advanced users.

description: A CWS file is a song file created by Songtrix, an application used to learn about and create music. It stores a song composition, which includes the song's style, notes, segments, credits, and structure. CWS files were replaced by .SNGX files with the release of Songtrix 4.
